reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good for kids who like to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun for kids
reviews.reviewText: These are so much fun & let's the kids use their imagination to build whatever they want. I really like the way the parts fit together so the pieces can move & the carry case is very helpful to keto the pieces together. I would definitely buy more kits like this. Could be a wonderful gift for a teacher or parent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas and he absolutely loved it. He said that they have some at his Sunday school and that he plays with it all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome toy for the imagination
reviews.reviewText: Great idea… my grands love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great toy for my 5 year old, he loves to play with them and build his ideas. The directions need help, if the plan is to build an example project. The quality is okay, we have had a few not stay together and I have had to glue a few. This toy does not get played with regularly and my son is very light on his toys. I would not suspect these toys to last if they were used regularly or with a child who is rough on toys., They are somewhat cheap plastic. Still fun to play with, great way to give the child ideas to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loved them.
reviews.reviewText: Very durable and love the container they come in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keeps the kids busy, tons of combinations. A great alternative to Legos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: Good product for younger kids.The pieces are made well - the color is bright and eye-catching!And they just snap together to make whatever your child can think of- comes with a book with example patterns if you need that.
these zoobs are so fun to use

reviews.reviewTitle: My son plays with this every single day!
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old son has played with this for at least an hour or two, every single day, and he has had this toy for a couple of months now. All the kids that come over love it, and I’ve already bought a few to give as birthday gifts. One of the parties was today and the kids all started playing with it immediatelyz. Some of the parents are going up buy it for their own children. Great quality, enough pieces and wheels, but all in a nice little case to bring anywhere. It comes camping with us, or anywhere to help entertain our son. My son is mostly amused by connecting type of toys or ones that involve vehicles, so this was a great buy! Will keep buying.

I ordered a set of 70+ pieces when my grandson was 4 years old. He plays with it every time he comes to visit. He builds such creative things. Never follows the instructions. Now 4 years later at 8 years old he asked me to get him more pieces because he doesn’t have enough ( none are lost) to build what he wants. So I ordered another set and he’s thrilled at what he can make!5 stars and worth every penny!The odd piece has broken because too much pressure used but I still give it 5 stars
Certaines pièces se séparent en deux morceaux.Et les plans ne sont pas assez détaillés, difficiles à comprendre.
So many parts with so many possibilities. It is good to see that the small round parts are connected to a straight part. I can not see this as a choking hazard.
